description:
Benjamin Franklin said it best in a letter to Jean-Baptiste Le Roy in 1789, “…in this world nothing can be said to be certain, except for death and taxes.” It’s over 200 years later and both are still true. While taxes are something that humanity could ideally and eventually overcome in a positive Roddenberry-type future, […]

Source
title: Deadlines Review

description:
Crowdfunding Quest is back with another batch of campaigns. We’ve got seven new campaigns for you to check out this week, from thematic games to euro games. And if you missed it on Friday, Austin posted his list of his Top 10 Marvel Champions scenarios. Check it out. Also, if you want to chat with […]
